about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm an experienced Software Developer with a solid background in web development as well as some mobile development. It is my passion to build slick & well optimized websites and web apps.
about.description2: Iâ€™m very much into gaming and learning to work with new technologies, always improving myself to stay on top of my field. Further, I like working out and do some cardio from time to time, I see it as a necessary balance to counter the sedentary life of a software developer.

projects.title: Featured Personal Projects
projects.rick&mortyDescription: App created to showcase and compare which characters share episodes together.
projects.marvelseekerDescription: App that showcases characters from the marvel universe. Information is retrieved from the Marvel public API.
projects.quiztimeDescription: Fun Quiz Time has the purpose of putting your history knowledge to the test. Most questions come from The Trivia API but you can also find user submitted questions.
projects.sinergiavaloresDescription: Website I designed as Freelance to display information and contact with an insurance company.
